common.title: Frak configuration
common.loadingTimeout: The loading has expired. Please try again.
common.allSet: Frak application is correctly set up

stepper.title: Setup guide
stepper.description: Use this guide to setup your Frak app.
stepper.footer: If you experience any issues or have any questions, just send us an email to <a />.

step1.title: Connection Status
step1.description: You need to connect your shop to the Frak ecosystem.

step2.title: Application pixel
step2.description: You need to connect your pixel to your store to track your customers purchases.

step3.title: Shopify Webhook
step3.description: You are going to connect your Shopify webhook to your store.

step4.title: Frak Webhook
step4.description: You are going to connect your Frak webhook to your store.

step5.title: Setup Frak embedded app within your theme
step5.link: Activate Frak embedded application in your theme
step5.description: Please activate the Frak Listener using the switch as shown below

step6.title: Add the share or wallet button in your theme
step6.descriptionShare: Please add Frak Sharing Button as shown below
step6.descriptionWallet: Please activate Frak Wallet Button as shown below
step6.linkShare: Add the Frak Sharing Button to your product page

pixel.title: Application pixel
pixel.connected: Your pixel is connected to your store.
pixel.notConnected: Your pixel is not connected to your store.
pixel.needConnection: You need to connect your pixel to your store to track your customers purchases.

webhook.title: Webhook
webhook.connected: Your Shopify webhook is connected to your store.
webhook.notConnected: Your Shopify webhook is not connected to your store.
webhook.frakConnected: Your Frak purchase tracker is connected to your store.
webhook.frakNotConnected: Your Frak purchase tracker is not connected to your store.
webhook.needConnection: You need to connect your Shopify webhook to your store to track your customers purchases.
webhook.needFrakConnection: You need to connect your Frak purchase tracker to your store to track your customers purchases.

theme.title: Theme
theme.link: Configuring Frak application in your theme
theme.todo: Please activate the Frak application in your theme by following the instructions below

gated.start: Create a Frak wallet to start using the app.

connectionStatus.title: Connection Status
connectionStatus.checking: We're checking if your shop is connected to the Frak ecosystem.
connectionStatus.connected: Your shop is successfully connected to the Frak ecosystem.
connectionStatus.notConnected: Your shop is not yet connected to the Frak ecosystem. Follow the instructions below to complete setup.

modal.title: Register your shop
modal.button: Register your shop in the Frak ecosystem

connectedShop.title: Your Shop on Frak
connectedShop.description: Your shop is successfully connected to the Frak ecosystem and ready to use all features.

campaign.title: Campaigns
campaign.description: The campaigns are the core parts of your monetization strategy with Frak. It will define what rewards will be distributed to end users.
campaign.name: Name
campaign.budgetInfo: This is the max amount of money that will be distributed to end users by this campaign.
campaign.rawCACInfo: This is the raw amount that will be distributed to referrer and referee.
campaign.ratioHelp: Adjust the split between referrer and referee (max 90-10%)

bank.title: Banks
bank.description: The banks are the source of cash that will be used to distribute rewards to end users.

purchase.title: Purchase
purchase.description: By making a Purchase you will add funds to the bank. The fund will be be used to distribute rewards to end users.

customizations.description: Customize the text displayed in Frak modals for different languages. These customizations will override the default text for your store.

single.label: Single Language
single.helpText: Use the same text for all users regardless of their location

multi.label: Multiple Languages
multi.helpText: Provide different text for French and English. Users will see text based on their browser language or location

sharing.title: Sharing Customization
sharing.description: Customize the text displayed when sharing your store.

modal.title: Frak Modal Customization
modal.description: Customize the text displayed in Frak modals for different languages.

sharing.title.label: Sharing Modal Title
sharing.title.description: The title that appears when users share your content on social media or messaging apps
sharing.title.placeholder: Example: 'Share this amazing product with your friends!'

sharing.text.label: Sharing Message Text
sharing.text.description: The default message that will be shared along with your product link
sharing.text.placeholder: Example: 'Check out this amazing product I found!'

sdk.wallet.login.primaryAction.label: Wallet Login Button Text
sdk.wallet.login.primaryAction.description: The text displayed on the main action button in the wallet login modal

sdk.wallet.login.text_sharing.label: Login Text for Sharing
sdk.wallet.login.text_sharing.description: Message shown to users when they need to login to share content and earn rewards
sdk.wallet.login.text_sharing.placeholder: Example: 'Share, Refer, Earn up to **{{ estimatedReward }}** per successful referral'

sdk.wallet.login.text_referred.label: Welcome Text for Referred Users
sdk.wallet.login.text_referred.description: Message shown to users who clicked on a shared link
sdk.wallet.login.text_referred.placeholder: Example: 'Welcome! Receive **{{ estimatedReward }}** when you make a purchase'

sharing.title: Preview sharing modal
sharing.description: Preview the text displayed in Frak modals.
sharing.placeholder: Share, Refer, Earn up to **{{ estimatedReward }}** per successful referral

referred.title: Preview referred modal
referred.description: Preview the text displayed in Frak modals.
referred.placeholder: Welcome! Receive **{{ estimatedReward }}** when you make a purchase

social.title: Preview social sharing
social.description: Preview the text displayed in social sharing.
social.sharingTitle: Do you know the Example site ? 😊
social.sharingText: I have an amazing product to share with you ! 😉

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.description: Manage your marketing campaigns and track their performance. Create new campaigns to distribute rewards to users and grow your customer base.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of your Frak integration across your store.

shareButton.link: Configure button in your product page
shareButton.noProduct: You need to add a product to your store to add the sharing button
shareButton.activated: Share button is on your product page
shareButton.notActivated: Share button is not in your product page
shareButton.todo: Please add the button as shown below

walletButton.link: Configure wallet button in theme editor
walletButton.activated: Wallet button is in your theme
walletButton.notActivated: Wallet button is not in your theme
walletButton.todo: Please add the button as shown below

funding.title: Funding
funding.description: Manage your funding sources and purchase history. Add funds to your banks to ensure your campaigns can distribute rewards to users.
